DOC.brief_summary: GW842166X is a selective non-cannabinoid CB2 receptor agonist, which is undergoing clinical development as a novel oral treatment for inflammatory pain. The purpose of the study is to compare the effects of formulation, food and particle size on the pharmacokinetic profiles of a single 175mg dose of GW842166X in healthy male and female volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Study on a Single Dose of GW842166X in Healthy Male and Female Subjects.
DOC.criteria: Body weight >50 Kg and BMI within the range 18.529.9 Kg/m2 inclusive. Healthy as judged by a responsible physician. Positive prestudy urine screen for drugs of abuse or alcohol breath test.
